projectDescription: Remote-Talk is a web conferencing application for online meetings and video conferences.
features: Authentication and Authorization: Remote Talk has a secure user authentication system with JWT tokens.
Responsive Design: Remote Talk is designed with a responsive interface for optimal user experience on different devices.
Meeting Features: Remote Talk allows users to create meetings with features such as virtual hand-raising, screen sharing, and live streaming.
Chat System: Remote Talk has a built-in messenger system for communication outside of meetings.
Profile Editing: Remote Talk users can edit their profiles and send friend requests.
Feedback System: Remote Talk has an option for users to provide feedback on the application.
Technology: Other tools and libraries: Tailwind, Socket.io,.
